Package Game

Class Packman

  • java.lang.Object
    • GIS.GIS_element_obj
      • Game.Packman
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GIS_element
    public class Packman
extends GIS_element_obj
    This class represents a Pacman object in our game. it will have Geom_element, Meta_data element, speed, eating radius to eat fruits, timeTraveled (updated for the last solution provided by algorithm run) and an orientation.

      void updateGeom​(java.lang.String firstBoardLine)
      This method will get a String representing all data about the new Object, but will only update the Geom of the Packman, i.e its Point3D position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Packman

        public Packman​(java.lang.String line)
        Constructor for the Packman object. gets a String and creates a new Packman object. The string is exactly in the form given in Ex4 string so we can parse with related indexes.
        Parameters:
        line - the string represents all data required to create a packman.

      • Packman

        public Packman​(Geom_element geometryOfElement,
               Meta_data_element dataOfElement,
               int ID)
        Constructor for the Packman object. gets a Geom_element and Meta_data_element, and ID.
        Parameters:
        geometryOfElement - Geom_element, the geometry object of the element.
        dataOfElement - Meta_data, the data of the element.
        ID - integer, ID to construct the packman with.

      • Packman

        public Packman​(Geom_element geometryOfElement,
               Meta_data_element dataOfElement,
               int ID,
               double speed,
               double eatRadius)
        Constructor for the Packman object. gets a Geom_element and Meta_data_element, ID, speed and eatRadius.
        Parameters:
        geometryOfElement - Geom_element, the geometry object of the element.
        dataOfElement - Meta_data, the data of the element.
        ID - integer, ID to construct the packman with.
        speed - double, speed of packman as meters/seconds.
        eatRadius - double, eating radius for the packman.

    • Method Detail

      • distancePointFromEatRadius

        public double distancePointFromEatRadius​(Point3D p)
        This method calculate distance point from radius of packman
        Parameters:
        p - - point to distance to
        Returns:
        the distance between the Radius of packman to Point p.

      • updateGeom

        public void updateGeom​(java.lang.String firstBoardLine)
        This method will get a String representing all data about the new Object, but will only update the Geom of the Packman, i.e its Point3D position.
        Parameters:
        firstBoardLine - String, the data about this packman needed to be parsed in order to update the Geom.
